doc:
Neil McCarthy (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neil_McCarthy_(actor) 0 Neil McCarthy (26 July 1932 – 13 August 1985) was a British actor known for his dramatic physical appearance caused by acromegaly. He was also a gifted linguist and pianist. Neil_McCarthy ( 26_July_1932 – 13_August_1985 ) was a_British_actor known for his_dramatic_physical_appearance caused by acromegaly . He was also a_gifted_linguist_and_pianist .
